content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory exists

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors due to lack of resources
- Ensure there are sufficient resources in the inventory or chest before attempting to use them
### Errors due to out of fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill or inserter has sufficient fuel before attempting to use them
### Errors due to no input liquid or fluid
- Ensure the steam engine or boiler has sufficient input liquid or fluid before attempting to use them
### Errors due to no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has sufficient ingredients to smelt before attempting to use them
### Errors due to no research in progress
- Ensure there is a research in progress in the lab before attempting to use it
